title: Advisory Firm Teneo Near Deal to Buy WestExec Advisors
sub_head: A deal would expand the firm’s focus on geopolitical and policy consulting
body:
Teneo Holdings LLC is close to a deal to buy an advisory firm that would expand the well-known public relations firm’s focus on geopolitical and policy consulting.
Teneo could finalize a deal to buy a majority stake in Washington, D.C.-based WestExec Advisors as soon as Wednesday, according to people familiar with the matter.
